summary: Clad that poor girl in a parka before she freezes
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: REQUIRES SKYRIM v1.8 AND DRAGONBORN DLC

====================================
SKALL KID AETA COAT
====================================
Author: MadCat221 (MadCat221@gmail.com)

Version: 1

February 15, 2013

1. Introduction
2: Installation
3. Version History

===============
1. INTRODUCTION
===============

Amongst the Skaal is a single token child, a girl named Aeta.  You may have noticed her by the fact that she is conspicuously gabred in generic kid clothes while everyone else has skaal parkas.  Not only is this kinda jarring, it is also a bit immersion-breaking because it\'s FREAKIN\' COLD in the Skaal Village and the generic girl outfit is not very warm-looking.

This mod rectifies this by introducing a kid-sized Skaal parka for her to wear.

===============
2. INSTALLATION
===============

Unpack the module and meshes into your Skyrim\\Data directory and activate SkaalKidAetaCoat.esp using the mod manager of your choice.

==================
3. VERSION HISTORY
==================

v1: 
Initial Release.
author: MadCat221
